p: To investigate the effect of recombinant HearNPVs on other hormone-related gene larvae, we detected mRNA levels of several key genes in orally infected H. armigera larvae using qRT-PCR, including the JH receptor gene HaMet, ultraspiracle ( HaUSP), a potential candidate for the JH receptor, JH regulated gene RNA-binding protein ( HaRBP), and ecdysone receptor gene HaEcR. We found that transcription of HaRBP and HaUSP increased in vHaBacΔegtdsJHBP-infected larvae compared to the control (vHaBacΔegt-infected larvae), while HaUSP expression was reduced in vHaBacΔegtdsJHAMT-infected larvae ( Figure 6). Additionally, HaEcR expression decreased in both recombinant HearNPV-infected larvae.
